name: Arrow Game (Penzy)
description:
This game is inspired by: icoso.itch.io/arrow-game

How to Play:-

Press the white highlighted arrow on your keyboard to get points.

Get as many points as you can in 20 seconds.

Try not to hit the wrong arrow.

Credits:-

Game Engine: Godot Engine 3.5

Art Software: Inkscape

Sound Effects from https://mixkit.co
